text:
NEW: Two black men say they were kicked out of Walmart for wearing protective masks. Others worry it will happen to them.

Wellesley professor @M_P_Jeffries: “Black folks can’t even wear hooded sweatshirts without being accused of being criminals.”

https://t.co/XWUr9GuRfj

urls.title: Two black men say they were kicked out of Walmart for wearing protective masks. Others worry it will happen to them.
urls.description: As the nation is told to wear masks, black Americans must also weigh the risks of racial profiling.
